website_summaries.verdict: Sealed drag makes this a durable choice for both freshwater and saltwater fishing.
pros: A good company with a good reputation that stands behind their product
Does a good job of preventing line twist
cons: Some users have had problems with bringing in bigger fish on this reel

customer_reviews.title: Great reel. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this reel to use for lightweight lures and finesse worms and it did not disappoint. It cast smoothly and very far for such light lures. It has a firm bail and the collapsible handle is a really cool feature. Before I realized you could lock it I was skeptical but it’s very easy to lock and it’s just an all around good reel. I would defiantly refer this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: C. West

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase. Made very well
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase. Made very well, it is as light as plastic reels but is made from aluminum so it's super sturdy. It fit snugly on the rod that I already had. Feels very secure while you're reeling in line and casting. Doesn't get tangled. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: A.Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Good Reel
customer_reviews.text: I truly think this may be the best reel for its price. We will see how it holds up to fish this weekend and I will edit the review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin r.

customer_reviews.title: Reel is as good as more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.text: The reel is outstanding. It is easy to clean. It also pulls in bigger fish than you expect quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer and Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I have many reels expensive than it. The quality of this reel is same to those. Good value. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian V.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is very affordable and the quality is comparable to reels twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this reel five stars because of the price. I don't think you can find a better reel for $25.
customer_reviews.author: Todd L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking reel. Small than expected and feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: When I asked him how he liked it, he said that it's very nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this reel for my husband. He loves to fish and was excited to use this. When I asked him how he liked it, he said that it's very nice. He also said that he hasn't had any problems with the lines twisting, and the casting is smooth. The reel is sturdy and appears to be much more costly than what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: 👓A GEEK who loves read & shop.🛍

customer_reviews.title: Smooth drag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Reel! Super Smooth. I'm using it for surf fishing for perch. Caught a few already and felt great so far. Got the 5000 for the bigger fish and landed a few stripers no problem. The drag is very smooth and took some time to bring in the 33” striper. Seems to be holding up to salt water so far. I do recommend doing a light rinse after every session.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I just received the RUNCL grim I. I was extremely pleased with the quality of the machine work and the balance of the reel itself. I mounted it to a 6'6" medium action rod. Took it out today and caught a nice bass first trip out with the RUNCL grim I. It handled very nice with a fish on. The drag is awesome as well. Over all I am pleased and happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cavinoff usa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as my Lews and Abu. I'd say for the price can't beat it it's very smooth. I put braid on it and has performed well again 5and 6 lb bass.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Dominguez

product_meta.title: RUNCL Spinning Reel Grim I 3000, Fishing Reel with Left/Right Interchangeable Collapsible Handle 5.2:1 Gear Ratio 10+1 Ball Bearings for Freshwater Saltwater Boat Fishing(Black)
feature_bullets: Smooth System: 10+1 precise stainless steel sealed bearings, strengthened alloy drivetrain, stronger precision NCTM brass gears and a stainless steel main shaft in RUNCL Grim I spinning reel provide you with smooth and balanced operation

CNC Spool: The spinning reel is equipped with a CNC-machined aluminum vented spool, it assists to spread the fishing line properly and appropriately all over the spool, it equally helps to push down the weight of the reel

Sturdy Body: The body of the spinning reel is constructed with high impact-protective component, efficient against abrupt pressure and external pressure, preserves the spinning reel safely and securely
Quality Drag Washer: This drag washer is constructed with premium quality carbon fiber, boosts maximum drag by 20%, and guarantees you a larger catch
Bigger Drag Knob: The spinning spool possesses big diameter drag knob, it enables you to change the drag effortlessly and swiftly when struggling with a giant catch
